full_summary:
# **Title of the Tender**
Maintain Accrual Budgeting Data Model

## **Reference Number**
PW-23-01030412
**Solicitation Number**
20231388A

## **Procurement Details**
* **Publication Date**: March 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date**: March 31, 2023
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada

## **Scope of Work**
The provision of maintenance and enhancement of the accrual budgeting data model on a monthly basis, and supporting the training of PWGSC key employees, is required.

## **Contract Duration**
The contract will be for a period of one (1) year, with an irrevocable option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

## **Notice of Tender**
The contract is subject to the bid requirements and procedures outlined in the TBIPS Notice of Public Procurement (NPP) guidelines.

## **Trade Agreements**
The contract is subject to various trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## **Regions of Opportunity**
The contract is available to all qualified contractors with a valid Goods and Services Number (GSIN) in Canada.

## **Regions of Delivery**
The contract will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## **How to Access**
The solicitation documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP), can be found at [CanadaBuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/20/36a06306339eecf7e3c8a7f7d014e12f/tbips_npp_20231388a.pdf). Interested bidders can also contact Eric Beaudry at eric.beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any inquiries.

Note: I have reformatted the text to make it more readable in markdown format. I have also included the contract duration, notice of tender, and the regions where the contract will be delivered.
